p: The DNN has become very popular recently but is still sparsely used by the geoscience community (Zhang, Zhang, & Du, 2016). The DNN is fully connected neural networks composed of multiple hidden layers together with non‐linear transformations and a variety of tailored architectures (Guo et al., 2016). The DNN has a capacity to analyze big data. In this study, we used a feed‐forward neural network.
